- Added 3 new ID casting tests for EvaluationDataset (integer, float, string IDs)
- Added 4 new ID casting tests for TrainingDataset (integer, float, string, mixed IDs)

This ensures robustness when IDs are provided as integers, floats, or strings from various sources.
